attributes.action: Lower the Cervical screening age in england from 25 to 18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Claire's Message!! Don't let another girl die unnecessarily!!
My wife Claire Walker-Everett died on the 18th of september 2008, aged 23years, she died of cervical cancer,The goverment of health say girl under age of 25 don't nomally get cervical cancer so they dont need to be screened for it, but obviously girls under that age do as my wife was only 23. if she had a smear theres a good chance she would still be alive now. she left behind my self and our 3 year old little boy, and all other family and friends.

rejection.details:
There are a couple of petitions that ask for a similar change. The most popular can be found at
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/smeartests/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
